name: OrganicGardenerPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Organic Gardener Podcast”
”Alexa, start Organic Gardener Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Organic Gardener Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: organic gardener podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Organic Gardener Podcast will inspire, teach, and promote earth friendly techniques by interviewing organic gardeners who share their journeys, tips, and tricks to simplify the process of growing your own delicious healthy food. Whether you want to have a small bed in your backyard or a full grown farming operation, our guests will help you reach your gardening goals and offer you resources and solutions to everyday gardening challenges, and inspiration to dig down in the dirt and get growing!

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Organic Gardener Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Organic Gardener Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
